etymons.meaning: to block up; to shut in, enclose; to hinder, impede; 571

Preterit.turoyo: ono səġli aq qayse lu saṯwoyaʕni qṭiʕili, maḥtili ʕal ḥḏoḏe aw bi ṣira
translations: 'I organized pieces of wood for the winter, that is, I cut them, put them on each other or in a row' (AA)

Infectum - wa.turoyo: … ḥǝmyoni u aḥuno Ṣaliba sayġiwa i goro d ʕito. ‘ 2018_07_08_au_003_NE_1F; 25:29
translations: My father in-law and brother Saliba were making a fence on the church roof.’
